email_body: PLEASE APPROVE HIM FOR THIS. PHILLIP WILL NOT BE ABLE TO GET INTO HIS EMAIL SYSTEM TO DO THIS. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, OR PROBLEMS, PLEASE CALL ME AT X3-7257. THANK YOU. INA. IF THIS IS A PROBLEM TO DO IT THIS WAY PLEASE CALL ME AND I WILL WALK PHILLIP THROUGH THE STEPS TO APPROVE. IF YOU CALL HIM, HE WILL DIRECT IT TO ME ANYWAY.
